item.description:
Sam Blumenfeld is a pioneer in the modern home school movement.  He has authored over 12 books, lectured around the world and has appeared on countless radio and TV shows. 

 

  Sam will explain the people and organizations behind the destruction of our public education system, Goals 2000, Look-Say, etc and what parents can to about it.

 

  program includes a full breakfast buffet $20.  Please send a check to Bill Mcnally 7 Blueberry Rd, Windham, NH 03087 C/O JBS Speakers Bureau
item.how_to_find_us: We will be using one of the function rooms-second floor
item.why: Come here Dr. Sam Blumenfeld, home school pioreer, author and lecturer give a talk on what happened to Ameerican education
item.name: Brainwashing for the New World Order
